    train_cfg=dict(
        rpn=dict(

                type='MaxIoUAssigner',

        rcnn=dict(

                neg_iou_thr=0.5,
                min_pos_iou=0.5,
                match_low_quality=False,
                ignore_iof_thr=-1),
            sampler=dict(

                num=512,

            debug=False)),
